General.Name: East Group Co Ltd
General.Description: East Group Co.,Ltd designs, produces, and sells power supply products and solutions in China and internationally. It offers line interactive, online transformerless, online transformer base, modular, low voltage, and Li-ions UPS products; accessories, such as batteries, as well as UPSmart, a monitoring software; and 5G base station, rail transit, and special power supply products. The company also provides off- and on-grid, and hybrid inverters, as well as monitoring solutions; photovoltaic inverters and power generation systems, lithium batteries, energy storage systems, charging piles and systems, micro-grid network, and smart distribution networks; modular data centers comprising cloud and edge computing data centers; and electric vehicle charging stations. The company was formerly known as Guangdong East Power Company Ltd. and changed its name to East Group Co.,Ltd in September 2015. East Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China. East Group Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Yangzhou Orient Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Songshan lake SCI&TECH Industry Park, Dongguan, China, 523808
